description: What type of game this is. `REG` - A regular season game. `WC` - A wildcard playoff game. `DIV` - A divisional playoff game. `CON` - A conference championship game. `SB` - A Super Bowl.
The numerical week the game takes place in. Continues incrementing after the regular season to each playoff round.
The abbreviation of the away team in the game.
The abbreviation of the home team in the game.
The number of times the away team has won the game.
The number of times the home team has won the game.
The number of times the game ended in a tie.
The amount of points the home team won by (or lost by if negative). Is `0` for tied games.
The number of times the game was played. For `game_type == 'REG'` this will equal the number of simulations. The number of playoff matchups will differ.
The rate the away team won the game counting ties as half a win.
The rate the home team won the game counting ties as half a win.
